strings.schematron.title: Schematron validation / GeoNetwork recommendations
strings.optional.title: Optional
strings.external.title: External
strings.generalContent.title: General Content
strings.EC1English: English value is required for Contact - Organization name
strings.EC1French: French value is required for Contact - Organization name
strings.EC1GovEnglish: English value for Contact - Organisation name in 'Government of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC1GovFrench: French value for Contact - Organisation name in 'Government of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC1GovAllowedEnglish: English value for Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Government of Canada', 'Government of Alberta', 'Government of British Columbia', 'Government of Ontario', 'Government of Nova Scotia', 'Government of Prince Edward Island' or 'Government of Newfoundland and Labrador'.
strings.EC1GovAllowedFrench: French value for Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Gouvernement du Canada', 'Gouvernement de l'Alberta', 'Gouvernement de la Colombie-Britannique', 'Gouvernement de l'Ontario', 'Gouvernement de la Nouvelle-Écosse', 'Gouvernement de l'Île-du-Prince-Édouard' or 'Gouvernement de Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador'.
strings.EC2: Value is required for Contact - Individual name
strings.EC3English: English value is required for Contact - Position name
strings.EC3French: French value is required for Contact - Position name
strings.EC4: Value is required for Keyword type
strings.EC5English: English value is required for Title
strings.EC5French: French value is required for Title
strings.EC9English: English value is required for Abstract
strings.EC9French: French value is required for Abstract
strings.EC11: Value is required for Maintenance and update frequency
strings.EC12: Value is required for Topic category
strings.EC13: Value is required for Data classification - Branch
strings.EC14: Value is required for Data classification - Directorate
strings.EC15: Value is required for Data classification - Security classification

strings.EC21: Value is required for Geographic extent

strings.EC23: Value is required for Access constraints
strings.EC24: Value is required for Usage constraints
strings.EC25English: English value is required for Keyword
strings.EC25French: French value is required for Keyword
strings.EC26English: English value is required for Distributor Contact - Organization name
strings.EC26French: French value is required for Distributor Contact - Organization name
strings.EC26GovEnglish: English value for Distributor Contact - Organisation name in 'Government of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC26GovFrench: French value for Distributor Contact - Organisation name in 'Government of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC26GovAllowedEnglish: English value for Distributor Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Government of Canada', 'Government of Alberta', 'Government of British Columbia', 'Government of Ontario', 'Government of Nova Scotia', 'Government of Prince Edward Island' or 'Government of Newfoundland and Labrador'.
strings.EC26GovAllowedFrench: French value for Distributor Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Gouvernement du Canada', 'Gouvernement de l'Alberta', 'Gouvernement de la Colombie-Britannique', 'Gouvernement de l'Ontario', 'Gouvernement de la Nouvelle-Écosse', 'Gouvernement de l'Île-du-Prince-Édouard' or 'Gouvernement de Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador'.

strings.EC37GovFrench: French value for Cited Responsible Contact - Organisation name in 'Government of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC37GovAllowedEnglish: English value for Cited Responsible Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Government of Canada', 'Government of Alberta', 'Government of British Columbia', 'Government of Ontario', 'Government of Nova Scotia', 'Government of Prince Edward Island' or 'Government of Newfoundland and Labrador'.
strings.EC37GovAllowedFrench: French value for Cited Responsible Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Gouvernement du Canada', 'Gouvernement de l'Alberta', 'Gouvernement de la Colombie-Britannique', 'Gouvernement de l'Ontario', 'Gouvernement de la Nouvelle-Écosse', 'Gouvernement de l'Île-du-Prince-Édouard' or 'Gouvernement de Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador'.

strings.DeliveryPoint_French: French value is required for Contact - Delivery Point

strings.MapResourcesREST: REST Map Resources should be available in english and french
strings.MapResourcesRESTNumber: The number of ESRI REST Map Resources should be at most 2 (one for english and one for french)
strings.MapResourcesWMS: WMS Map Resources should be available in english and french
strings.MapResourcesWMSNumber: The number of WMS Map Resources should be at most 2 (one for english and one for french)
strings.ResourceDescription: Online resource description is not valid. The format should be: ContentType;Format;Lang
strings.ResourceDescriptionContentType: Online resource description content type is not valid. Valid values are: Web Service,Service Web,Dataset,Données,API,Application,Supporting Document,Document de soutien
strings.ResourceDescriptionFormat: Online resource description format is not valid. Valid values are:
strings.ResourceDescriptionLanguage: Online resource description language is not valid. Should be a comma separated values of ISO-LANG-3 codes
strings.OpenLicense: An Open Goverment Licence is required. Accepted English values: Open Government Licence - Canada (http://open.canada.ca/en/open-government-licence-canada) or Open Government Licence – Newfoundland and Labrador (https://opendata.gov.nl.ca/public/opendata/page/?page-id=licence) or Open Government Licence – Nova Scotia (https://novascotia.ca/opendata/licence.asp) or Open Government Licence – Ontario (https://www.ontario.ca/page/open-government-licence-ontario) or Open Government Licence – Prince Edward Island (https://www.princeedwardisland.ca/en/information/finance/open-government-licence-prince-edward-island) or Open Government Licence - British Columbia (https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content/data/open-data/open-government-licence-bc) or Open Government Licence - Alberta (https://open.alberta.ca/licence). Accepted French values : Licence du gouvernement ouvert - Canada (http://ouvert.canada.ca/fr/licence-du-gouvernement-ouvert-canada) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert – Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador (https://opendata.gov.nl.ca/public/opendata/page/?page-id=licence) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert – Nouvelle-Écosse (https://novascotia.ca/opendata/licence.asp) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert – Ontario (https://www.ontario.ca/fr/page/licence-du-gouvernement-ouvert-ontario) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert – Île-du-Prince-Édouard (https://www.princeedwardisland.ca/fr/information/finances/licence-du-gouvernement-ouvert-ile-du-prince-edouard) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert - Colombie-Britannique (https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content/data/open-data/open-government-licence-bc) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert - Alberta (https://open.alberta.ca/licence)
strings.EndPosition: End position date should be after begin position
strings.BeginPositionFormat: Begin position format is not valid value
strings.EndPositionFormat: End position format is not valid value
strings.ECCountry: Country should have a value as defined in the ISO 3166 code list. See https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search/code/
strings.ECThesaurusOrg: Thesaurus cited responsible party organisation is required
strings.ECThesaurusRole: Thesaurus cited responsible party role is required
strings.ECThesaurusEmail: Thesaurus cited responsible party email is required
strings.ReferenceSystemInfo: Value is required for Reference System
strings.MetadataStandardName: Value is not valid for Metadata Standard Name, should be 'North American Profile of ISO 19115:2003 - Geographic information - Metadata' in english and 'Profil nord-américain de la norme ISO 19115:2003 - Information géographique - Métadonnées' in french
strings.SpatialRepresentation: Value is required for Spatial representation
strings.DistributionFormatInvalid: Value for distribution format is not valid
strings.InvalidAccessConstraints: Access constraints code is not valid
strings.InvalidUseConstraints: Use constraints code is not valid
strings.CoreSubjectThesaurusMissing: Core Subject Thesaurus keywords are mandatory
